biotools.summary: DRYGIN (Data Repository of Yeast Genetic Interactions)-a web database system that provides a central platform for yeast genetic network analysis and visualization. DRYGIN searches SGA interactions and integrates other data sources, in order to associate the genetic interactions with pathway information, protein complexes, other binary genetic and physical interactions, and Gene Ontology functional annotation.
